page.title: 08CHURCH AND CHAPEL
page.content: {St. Peter's Church}is in the centre of the village. It is a small church overlooking the beach, and this year is celebrating its centenary. The{Methodist Chapel}has a longer history than the church in the village, being built in 1861. Members of the{Church Sunday School } meet twice a month, and once a month join with the church members for a family service and once a month for Family Communion. The{Coverack Carolare}is an annual event which takes place in August. Organised by the Methodist Church, it is an{interdenominational service,}the highlight of which is a service on the harbour. Each year a male-voice choir, a ladies choir, the St. Keverne Silver Band and hundreds of people from miles around gather on the harbour to take part in the service.
